title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Mailing List
body: Big River Journey: Mailing List       Selection of schools for spring field trips is made by lottery held each fall. To receive flyers announcing lottery and mailings about other Big River Journey opportunities, please send, fax, or e-mail your name, school, complete address, phone, fax, and e-mail to:  Mississippi National River and Recreation Area Brian Goodspeed Suite 105 111 Kellogg Blvd. East St. Paul, MN 55101-1256 Fax: 651-290-3214  Flyers announcing spring opportunities are sent out after Labor Day with lottery selection held in mid-October.
